title: Christmas Mischief: The Christmas Cuckoo / Sunshine for Christmas / The Christmas Tart
description: Three Regency novellas. The Christmas Cuckoo is the tale of a young woman who brings the wrong man back from the local coaching inn.Sunshine for Christmas features a sad young aristocrat who finds a special treat when he escapes to Italy for the holidays. In The Christmas Tart a young Frenchwoman learns that her choice for survival may be a chance for happiness. Regency Romance novellas by Mary Jo Putney; previous published by Signet in various collectionsOut of Print in this edition but all works now contained within Christmas Revels
author: Mary Jo Putney
